channel.title: [URGENT] SamoanKilla's Client Error! [URGENT]
channel.description:
[i][b]Allright so one run.bat works and the other one doesnt. Now when I Jar the client, It gets the same message as the non working one. Please help me get the outcome of the other run.bat[/b][/i]
[u][b]Working .bat[/b][/u] [code] @echo off start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit [/code]
[u][b]Not Working .bat[/b][/u] [code] @Echo Off @Title ServerName Here. @Color 0A "C:/Program files/java/jre6/bin/java" -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32 @Exit [/code]
[u][b]I MADE A VIDEO OF THE ERROR! LINK IS BELOW![/b][/u]
Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AuMs6EB9jOE

item.title: [URGENT] SamoanKilla's Client Error! [URGENT]
item.dc:creator: @samoankilla samoankilla
item.description:
@samoankilla wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:402637”][quote author=samoankilla link=topic=499695.msg3654537#msg3654537 date=1309925700]
Allright so one run.bat works and the other one doesnt.
Now when I Jar the client, It gets the same message as the non working one.
Please help me get the outcome of the other run.bat

Working .bat

@echo off
start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

Not Working .bat

@Echo Off
@Title ServerName Here.
@Color 0A
"C:/Program files/java/jre6/bin/java" -Xmx300m client 10 0 highmem members 32
@Exit

I MADE A VIDEO OF THE ERROR! LINK IS BELOW!

Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AuMs6EB9jOE
[/quote]

probably because the main class is Gui, not client.[/quote]
Nope I edited the main class to Gui on the non-working .bat and it didnt even load now.

Read full topic
